metadata.drive_system: Protium Converter Torch x6 + ICF VII (Exotic)
metadata.armor_upgrade_note: Upgraded from Titanium to Adamantane - 2.68x thicker at same mass

heavy_siege_coiler_mk3.name: Heavy Siege Coiler Mk3
heavy_siege_coiler_mk3.notes: Capital ship siege weapon. Fires 3-shot salvos of 656kg slugs. 21.75 GJ per salvo. Slower projectiles (4.7 km/s) give targets more evasion time but hits are devastating. Only fits Battleship/Dreadnought class (3 nose hardpoints).

torpedo_launcher.name: Trident Torpedo
torpedo_launcher.notes: Compact fusion torch: 250kg penetrator, 12g accel, 14 km/s dv (matches alien Iridescent)

dreadnought_siege.design_notes: Siege variant replaces standard spinal coiler with heavy siege coiler. Trades 10% acceleration for +407% alpha strike damage (21.75 GJ salvo vs 4.29 GJ single shot). Slower projectiles (4.7 km/s vs 9.9 km/s) give targets more evasion time but impacts are devastating. Best used for breaking defensive positions and punishing slow capital ships.

thrust_vectoring.description: Main engine nozzle deflection for high-authority rotation

rcs.description: Reaction Control System for maneuvering without main thrust
